scripts.pack: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src dockerfile docker-compose.yml package.json package-lock.json .env dist/
scripts.dev: docker build -t message-server . && docker compose --env-file .env config && docker compose up
scripts.deploy: npm run pack && rsync -av dist/ rasp:message-server && ssh rasp 'cd message-server; docker build -t message-server .; docker compose --env-file .env config; docker compose up -d;'
